overview:
Coreyâ€™s the COO and one of the founding members of Squidoo.com, the popular recommendation engine and publishing platform started by Seth Godin in 2005. Corey is Squidooâ€™s go-to guy for everything from biz dev and strategy to wireframes and wikis.

Before joining Squidoo, Corey was the founder and CEO of Solutions Factory, a web strategy, custom content, design and development firm based in the Washington, DC metro area. Corey advised companies such as Raytheon Corporation, Time Warner Cable and Columbia Energy Group on a wide range of web-based initiatives.

During the go-nuts-now, make-money-later 90â€™s, he still managed to run the highly profitable web division of Another Universe, where he designed and led development on a contextual commerce platform. He also led business development on e-commerce partnerships with The Sci-Fi Channel, Marvel Entertainment, and Sony Pictures.

Corey is the founder of Bright Cowork, a collaborative, creative, coworking space in Old Town Winchester, Virginia.

Corey has been staring at code for hours on end since the 1980s. To keep his eyes from crossing, he spends time goofing off with his wife and daughters and playing bass.
